channel.title: Need help please :( UPDATED
channel.description: hey guys, just downloaded AA "Americas army" but then, i cancelled it cause i found out it was a wrong file... then i was gunna delete it but..... then it keeps saying "this program is being used" i checked if it was but it wasnt. there any RIP program that can delete it?

item.title: Need help please :( UPDATED
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

First, close your internet browser as that’s the application thats most likely using it. Note that the process could still exist even after closing it, so look in task manager as well.

If you still can’t delete it, have a look for a program by SysInternals (I think its owned by Microsoft now) called Process Explorer. When you have it loaded, go to Find->Handle and search for your filename. It will tell you exactly which process is using the file, and you can either terminate the entire process or simply close the handle referencing your file.

Read full topic
